page.title: 06CAPEL SCHOOL ANNUAL EVENTS
page.content: CAPEL SCHOOL HOLDS MANY ANNUAL EVENTS ARRANGED BY TEACHERS AND THE PARENTS ASSOCIATION FOR ENTERTAINMENT AND TO PROVIDE FUNDS TO BUY SCHOOL EQUIPMENT. THIS YEAR{THE MAYFAIR}WAS HELD ON MAY 18TH. THERE WAS DANCING ROUND THE MAYPOLE AND EMMA MAY WAS CROWNED MAY QUEEN. STALLS, GAMES AND SIDESHOWS MADE Â£900 PROFIT. {THE SCHOOL SPORTS}WERE HELD ON JUNE 15TH. FOUR HOUSE TEAMS ROMANS, SAXONS, VIKINGS AND NORMANS COMPETED - SAXONS WON AND RECEIVED THE HOUSE TROPHY. ON JULY 6TH.{THE SWIMMING GALA}WAS HELD AT ST. JOHN'S POOL. A SPONSORED SWIM PRECEDED THE GALA WHICH RAISED Â£700 FOR SCHOOL EQUIPMENT. {OUR MUSICAL EVENING,}A POPULAR VILLAGE EVENT, WAS HELD ON JULY 18TH. CHILDREN SANG AND PLAYED MUSICAL INSTRUMENTS SUCH AS RECORDERS, XYLOPHONES, GUITAR, VIOLINS AND PIANO.
